template.subject: APRA Request - [SPECIFIC DESCRIPTION]
template.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Indiana Access to Public Records Act (APRA), Indiana Code ยง 5-14-3-1 et seq., I respectfully request access to the following public records:

[DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF RECORDS REQUESTED]

This request is made under APRA, which provides that "all persons are entitled to full and complete information regarding the affairs of government and the official acts of those who represent them as public officials and employees."

Please provide the records in the following format: [SPECIFY: copies, electronic format, inspection, etc.]

Contact Information:
Name: [YOUR FULL NAME]
Address: [YOUR COMPLETE ADDRESS]
Phone: [YOUR PHONE NUMBER]
Email: [YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS]

I understand that under Indiana law, you have 24 hours to respond to this request if made in person or by phone, or 7 days if submitted by mail, fax, or email. Please acknowledge receipt of this request within the appropriate timeframe and provide the records within a reasonable time thereafter.

If any portion of this request is exempt from disclosure, please identify the specific statutory exemption under IC 5-14-3-4 and provide any segregable portions that can be released.

If you believe any fees will be charged for this request, please provide an estimate before proceeding.

If this request is denied in whole or in part, please provide a written explanation of the denial. I may seek an advisory opinion from the Indiana Public Access Counselor if necessary.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
[YOUR NAME]
[DATE]

Note: This request is made under the Indiana Access to Public Records Act (IC 5-14-3-1 et seq.).
